name: Outdoor Research Swift Cap Printed - Unisex
description:
Don't become a hothead, this hat has ventilated back panels to let you blow off steam. Moisture-resistant and UPF 30 fabric shelter you from light rain and sun.Made of polyester with nylon (60% recycled content) under the brim.Mesh panels vent heat.TransAction™ headband wicks moisture.Shaped, plastic-stiffened bill offers shade and helps block glare.Quick-release buckle to adjust the fit.

        Sustainability
